item.description:
We'll have our February meet up on Sunday, 2/22 from 11am-1pm.

Please remember if it's your first time coming, to check in at the front desk and have the updated vaccination records for your fur baby.

Retail will be 20% off for those interested. Anyone wishing to book a grooming appointment, please let me know. We'll be happy to schedule one. Grooming includes a bath, brushing, nail trim and an ear cleaning. You may need to come back to pick your baby up.

Looking forward to seeing you all!! Any questions, please let me know.

Agni & The Team at Best Friends
item.name: Pug Lovers February Meetup
